Blog.post: Shake Zula! Cause we are the Aqua Teens! Yeah! I got Aqua Teen Hunger Force DVDs!! Volumes 1 and 2!! The innocent shall suffer...big time!! These DVDs are T3h 4w350m3!!

Canada was, well, AWESOME!! Amazing! And did I mention, Awesome!? Well, it all began with a 15 hour van ride that included a long delay at the border, that resulted in our group to be pretty late to the campus. We then got our track groups, and I ended up with woking with children (oh joy). Our track got to run a VBS that did Rickshaw Rally (oh bigger joy) at a Salvation Army Church in the, as the Salvation Army leader said, "projects" or "ghetto" of Kingston. So I'm thinkin, "Great." But, it turned out to be good. The kids were great, and apart from our track leader splitting her head open on the bus' back door and bleeding all over herself, nothing really bad happened. The services were awesome, the dorm rooms were beyond awesome, pretty much everything was awesome. Well, I've rambled on for enough now, leave some comments. P.S, "Ne Na Kulu Murasula, la Yasua" P.P.S, Greg: "Pico Nala Mufasa"
It's the end of the party, and its time to sign off now. We're off to Canada.

I, Robot was an awesome movie. Excellent action, excellent plot, and for once, pretty good acting. All in one movie. Amazing. Some excellent one-liners too. If you have the time, GO SEE IT!! - "Ahhhh, CHOO!! Oh, I'm sorry, I'm allergic to bullsh*t."

If anyone could offer me help with XML and CSS, and how to convert them to HTML, it would be very appreciated! I get most of it, but if you know alot about them, it would be nice to have a source of knowledge.
Well, I've set up a blog now, so people can leave comments. I'm still a little new to this, so bear with me for a little while I get this set up. Anyways, have fun!

Finally!! After a month, we finally sold our house! So now, we can move to the house we want in Jolliff Woods, on Barn Swallow, umm road? drive? circle? *doesn't know*. :) I don't know the number either, but w/e. Moving will be interesting, will prolly happen in a coupl'a weeks. I gotta redo the home network, run wires through the attic and walls and everything, a good day's job. Anyway, less noise, less car and foot traffic, and less light. YAY I'm happy!

YES!! Finally! The new episode of ATHF!!! LOL Transmission from mooninites! "This is not a fight, this is a war!" LOL Spraypaint!! "I will rock your face!" "We can F with him all day" NEW MOONINITE!!! Cliffe!! He's BLUE!! Cliffe's check! Meatwad in microwave! "The pressure on my eyes was indescribable" LOL FOIL!!!! LOL "Crudely drawn plans" LOL!! SLAP!! LOL "Magic House" "Mexicano" LOL "That small star" "Sometimes I kinda want to die" "I bought me some gum" "It's emmitting radiation: the kidney losing kind" "Why are we trying to cash a bill?" "I've been hauling a radioactive bill all over town, for yor guys? LOL BOOM!!! WHOA!! Shaved Carl? "Or for 59 cents more, try the super size." That was AWESOME!!!

I just bought a Wireless NIC on Wed., and now I will be doing some wardriving. Did some last night, and found a few. However, I did some more wardriving today and WOW! I went into Miars Plantation (expensive neighborhood) and my count jumped hugely!! A couple used WEP, but most didn't. Anyway, if you have a laptop and WNIC, or if you would just like to join the fun, contact me. OH!! If you have a GPS receiver that plugs into a comp's serial port, can I borrow it? Please!?!?
